attributes.action: Legislate to prevent power companies from introducing retrospective price increases.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have just received a letter from my duel fuel power supplier,Atlantic,informing me that they are increasing their prices as of 25 August 2008,thats seven weeks ago!!
If Tesco tried this there would be riots,yet the power companies are allowed to get away with it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
